title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building and validating cloud controls with generative AI (COP350)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式AI构建和验证云控制 (COP350)
abstract: Managing controls and compliance across AWS environments traditionally requires significant manual effort and expertise. This technical session demonstrates how to leverage generative AI to automate and enhance compliance monitoring and validation processes. Learn how GenAI can accelerate AWS account customization through AWS Control Tower, author AWS Config rules, and analyze AWS CloudTrail logs. Leave this session with practical examples and patterns for using GenAI to reduce the complexity of governance while strengthening your compliance and security posture.
abstract_cn: 在AWS环境中管理控制和合规性传统上需要大量的手动工作和专业知识。本技术会议演示如何利用生成式AI来自动化和增强合规性监控和验证流程。了解GenAI如何通过AWS Control Tower加速AWS账户定制化，编写AWS Config规则，以及分析AWS CloudTrail日志。通过本会议，您将获得使用GenAI降低治理复杂性同时加强合规性和安全态势的实用示例和模式。
